divs: sighting detailson this date 10\12\2009 this investigator received information from a reliable source that the military would be conducting fly overs in the texas city area. my reliable source who wish to remain anonymous stated at a breifing was held with the law enforcement agenies in the area along with the fly overs could cause hallucinations causing citizens to see strange lights in the sky and over the waters in the area. the description of the military aircraft was given as a gray c27j a light transport plane.
